Floral Basket and Letter to Kim Jong Il 
   Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
 They were handed to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Thursday by Bashir Ramadan Khalifa Abu Janah, secretary of the People's Bureau of Libya who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Ugandan Delegation
articles.content:
Gift and letter to Kim Jong Il 
   Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift and letter by the Ugandan National Women's Council.
 They were handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday by Chairwoman Rose Najjemba Muyinda who is heading the delegation of the council on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Hangawi, Folk Holiday of Korea
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Ugandan Delegation 
   Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Ugandan National Women's Council headed by Chairwoman Rose Najjemba Muyinda at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
 On hand were Ri Yong Hui, vice-chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union, and officials concerned.    
 The head of the delegation said that she could know better about personalities of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il as great men through her current visit to the DPRK. Under their wise leadership the DPRK has developed into an invincible country whose national power is strong and where the people are in single-minded unity, she added.

articles.content:
Congolese Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Important Days in DPRK Formed
   Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating the 61st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 80th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union was held in Brazzaville on Sept. 27.
 Present at the ceremony were personages of the Congolese Socialist Party and Marien Ngouabi University and members of organizations for the study of the Juche idea.    
 The ceremony elected Leon Nzokene, general secretary of the Congolese Socialist Party, chairman of the preparatory committee.
